
External Examples
=================

This is a list of packages using ``subsurface`` as input or output of a
workflow. If you have your own example let us know to be added to the gallery.

.. caution::

    Please note that these examples link to external websites.
    If any of these links are broken, please raise an issue on the repository.


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Loading a segy cube into `subsurface.StructuredData`.">


.. only:: html

    .. figure:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/trhallam/segysak/main/docs/_static/logo_small.png
       :target: https://segysak.readthedocs.io/en/latest/examples/example_subsurface.html

       Using segysak with subsurface


.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:


   Using segysak with subsurface <https://segysak.readthedocs.io/en/latest/examples/example_subsurface.html>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Build a model from Subsurface object and export result back to subsurface">


.. only:: html

    .. figure:: https://docs.gempy.org/_images/sphx_glr_gempy_subsurface_002.png
       :target: https://docs.gempy.org/integrations/gempy_subsurface.html#sphx-glr-integrations-gempy-subsurface-py

       GemPy - Subsurface Link


.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:


   GemPy - Subsurface Link <https://docs.gempy.org/integrations/gempy_subsurface.html#sphx-glr-integrations-gempy-subsurface-py>
